name: Light 'em up!
description:
You only have one Job, Light em up!

When you see a cigarette pointing at you press the right mouse button once to light the lighter, then hover on the cigarette to light it. Don't light a cigarette if its orange part is pointed at you.
The more you play the faster it gets! (exept Zen)

 Have fun!

(i dont condone smoking at all)
